com.tcp.server

Class ServerGlobal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tcp.server.ServerGlobal

  • public class ServerGlobal
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has the global variables,flags and analysis method of server and tcpWorker
    Since:
    1
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Nikolas Chatzigiannis nchatz03@cs.ucy.ac.cy

    • Method Detail

      • getServerAnalytics

        static void getServerAnalytics()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Server analysis method

        This method creates a file containing server's analysis and reinitialize the global variables and flags to keep server alive.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file exception
